Hero.title: Discover digital art & Collect NFTs
Hero.text: NFT marketplace UI created with Anima for Figma. Collect, buy and sell art from more than 20k NFT artists.

Trends.title: Trending Collection
Trends.subtitle: Checkout our weekly updated trending collection.

Ranking.title: Top Creators
Ranking.subtitle: Checkout Top Rated Creators on the NFT Marketplace

HowItWorks.title: How it works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Find out how to get started

1.title: Setup Your wallet
1.text: Set up your wallet of choice. Connect it to the NFT market by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner.

2.title: Create Collection
2.text: Upload your work and setup your collection. Add a description, social links and floor price.

3.title: Start Earning
3.text: Choose between auctions and fixed-price listings. Start earning by selling your NFTs or trading others.

Subscribe.title: Join our weekly digest
Subscribe.subtitle: Get exclusive promotions & updates straight to your inbox.
